jobTitle: Product Director - Product Offerings and Growth
jobDescription: WeWork is the platform for creators, providing hundreds of thousands of members around the world with space, community, and services that enable them to do what they love and build their life's work. Our mission is to create a world where people work to make a life, not just a living, and our own team members are central to that goal.  We are creating software for physical space that uses data and technology at each point in the building process, such that it can make better sourcing decisions, improve its designs, build faster and smarter, and ultimately improve the lives of the people working within its buildings. Our state of the art technologies and dedication to technological innovation are key reasons why WeWork has been able to scale from operating one workspace location to more than 210 in just over eight years.  The mission of Product Offerings and Growth is to guide future members of all sizes to the best solution, help them grow with us, and to power the evolution of our product offerings. It focuses specifically on systems that showcase our offerings, expand the audience for these offerings, deliver accurate pricing and inventory, and ensure that becoming a member is a flawless and delightful experience.  Are you someone with a strong creative streak? Do you love fast paced exciting environments? Are you looking to contribute to making a real impact across many different communities and cultures with the work that you're doing?
